With the CoGuess application you can play a cooperative guessing game in different ways. The goal is to guess as a group as many words within a limited time. Click Start! for the countdown to begin, then the first player takes the phone and presses Reveal! to show the word. The other people must guess the word and with the green and red buttons you can keep track of the scored points. Now the next players are up until the time runs out! You can try to bring across the word in many ways, see below for some examples.
Gather as many different Lego® bricks as possible and build the words out of Lego®.\nRecommended categories: Nature, Objects, Structures, Vehicles.
Bring across the word without making any sound whatsoever.\nRecommended categories: Nature, Objects, Structures, Vehicles.
Just use pen and paper, a stick on the beach, or just about anything to draw the words.\nRecommended categories: Nature, Objects, Structures, Vehicles.

Explain the word while not mentioning it or any of its constituents. The difficulty can be increased by additional requirements, by for example only being allowed to mention a single word.\nRecommended categories: All.

This game mode only works while the explanation is clearly visible to all other players and you can guess while explaining. All players explain and guess at the same time, you get a point for a correct guess as well as a correct explanation.
